text: Lipatov () is a Russian masculine surname originating from the given name Ipat, its feminine counterpart is Lipatova. It may refer to *Alexander Lipatov (born 1981), Russian slalom canoeist *Lev Lipatov (1940–2017), Russian physicist *Svetlana Lipatova (born 1993), Russian wrestler ==References== Category:Russian-language surnames
title: Lipatov
